meanings.definition: Used to express a sense of surprise or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: Oh, ou! I can't believe it!
meanings.sent3: Haha, ou! You really got me there!

meanings.definition: A unit of resistance equal to one volt per ampere.
meanings.sent1: The circuit had a high ou, making it difficult for the current to flow.
meanings.sent2: The technician measured the ou of the electrical component.
meanings.sent3: The ou in the wire seemed to be causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: The ou in the system acted like a barrier to the electricity.
meanings.sent5: The precise ou value was crucial for the experiment.
